mapper.select: SELECT schedule_num, schedule_title, TO_char(schedule_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') schedule_start, TO_char(schedule_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS') schedule_end, schedule_allDay FROM noback_schedule

select schedule_num, schedule_title, to_char(schedule_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_end, schedule_memo, schedule_writer, schedule_level from noback_schedule where schedule_num = #{schedule_num}

select schedule_num, schedule_title, to_char(schedule_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_end, schedule_memo, schedule_writer from noback_schedule where to_char(schedule_start, 'mm') = #{month} order by schedule_start

select schedule_num, schedule_title, to_char(schedule_start, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_start, to_char(schedule_end, 'yyyy-mm-dd dy') as schedule_end, schedule_memo, schedule_writer from noback_schedule where to_char(schedule_start, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm') order by schedule_start
mapper.insert:
insert into noback_schedule ( schedule_num, schedule_title, schedule_writer, schedule_level,
schedule_memo,
schedule_start, schedule_end, schedule_allDay ) values ( cal_seq.nextval, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_writer}, #{schedule_level},
#{schedule_memo},
TO_DATE(#{schedule_start}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{schedule_end}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS'), #{schedule_allDay} )
